mapper.insert: INSERT INTO terminals (airport_code, terminal_code, terminal_name, is_international, is_domestic) VALUES ( #{terminalObj.airportCode}, #{terminalObj.terminalCode}, #{terminalObj.terminalName}, #{terminalObj.isInternational}, #{terminalObj.isDomestic} )
mapper.update: UPDATE terminals SET airport_code = #{airportCode}, terminal_code = #{terminalCode}, terminal_name = #{terminalName}, is_international = #{isInternational}, is_domestic = #{isDomestic} WHERE terminal_id = #{terminalId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM terminals WHERE airport_code = #{airportCode} AND terminal_code = #{terminalCode}
